home.machupicchu_magia: ¡Machu Picchu and its magic await for you!
home.servicios_desc: At Hoteles Peruano Suiza we are proud to offer you a range of services designed to make your stay as pleasant as possible.
home.serv_comida_desc: elicious buffet breakfast in the style of Machu Picchu
home.serv_masaje_desc: assage and aromatherapy sessions to relax you after a day of exploration.
home.serv_guias_desc: uides to help you make the most of your tour.
home.sub_desc: Hoteles Peruano Suiza is the ideal hotel to relax and unwind in the shadow of the Lost City, our modern and comfortable rooms have an incredible view of the Vilcanota River and the mountains that surround the area, they have everything you need to give you the maximum experience of comfort and pleasure. In addition, we have the capacity to comfortably accommodate several people, so they are perfect if you arrive at Machu Picchu with your family or friends and are looking for a first-class stay.
home.sub_desc_pie: Nearby Hotels Peruano Suiza there are several places of interest, such as the thermal baths of Machu Picchu, the handicraft market and the bus stop.
home.sub_title_pie: ¡Your stay in Machu Picchu will be perfect if you stay with us!
home.nos_hace_feliz_tenerte_title: We are glad to meet you
home.nos_hace_feliz_tenerte_desc: Hotels Peruano Suiza welcomes you in a warm room that you can use to rest or share with us the stories of your trip. Our dining room awaits you to delight you with the best breakfasts you have ever tried in Machu Picchu. The 16 modern and comfortable rooms of the Hotel Peruano Suiza are duly equipped and have a private telephone, satellite television, hair dryer, bottle of water, minibar *, safe * and bathroom with shower, which will allow you to rest comfortably and peacefully.
home.nos_hace_feliz_tenerte_pie: Our goal is to provide you with the maximum experience of comfort and pleasure
home.ubicanos_subtitle: In the navel of the world,
habitaciones.title: SUIZO HOTELS
habitaciones.subtitle: Peruano Suiza Hotel has 16 rooms between Standard, Superior
habitaciones.matrimonialph1: Nice rooms with full size bed
habitaciones.matrimonialdesc: Nice rooms with full size bed, 32” TV with DirecTV, Heating, Desk, Chair, Free Wi Fi, Soap, Shampoo, set of towels
habitaciones.dobledesc: Nice rooms with 2 twin size beds, 32” TV with DirecTV, Heating, Desk, Chair, Free Wi Fi, Soap, Shampoo, set of towels
habitaciones.dobleph1: Nice rooms with 2 twin size beds
habitaciones.estandardesc: Nice rooms with full size bed, 32” TV with DirecTV, Heating, Desk, Chair, Free Wi Fi, Soap, Shampoo, set of towels
habitaciones.estandarph1: Nice rooms with full size bed
habitaciones.tripledesc: Nice rooms with 3 beds of twin size, 32” TV with DirecTV, Heating, Desk, Chair, Free Wi Fi, Soap, Shampoo, set of towels
habitaciones.tripleph1: Nice rooms with 3 beds of twin size
habitaciones.hotel: Hoteles Peruano Suiza is located in the citadel of Aguas Calientes just 30 minutes from the magnificent Historic Sanctuary of Machu Picchu. Hoteles Peruano Suiza seeks to immerse you in the exceptional experience of Switzerland with the essence of Peru, our team of friendly collaborators will be able to offer you a range of services designed to make your stay as pleasant as possible, we are sure that you will enjoy a first-rate experience.
aboutus.title: ABOUT US
aboutus.titledesc: We are an elegant and comfortable hotel, with the modernity and nature that our guests require. Our number of rooms allows us to provide a highly personalized and familiar attention, we strive every day to provide all the service and comfort that you deserve, which makes our hotel your best travel experience.
aboutus.calides_amabilidad_desc: We offer a careful and friendly treatment, giving our best attitude to make our visitors feel welcome and appreciated
aboutus.compromiso_puntulidad_desc: We are aware of how important it is to fulfill each of our functions and serve our guests. Everything you need will be there on time
aboutus.excelencia_calidad_desc: With a quality service and small details we exceed the expectations of our visitors, more than their satisfaction, we want their loyalty
aboutus.comunicacion_desc: Adaptation to change: We practice timely and non-judgmental communication that allows us to see change as an opportunity for development
aboutus.resena_historica_desc: Because where others see difficulties, we see opportunities. In the midst of a health crisis, Jorge and José Gabriel, passionate about providing excellent care, decided to undertake a new project within the hotel sector and with the aim of immersing visitors in an exceptional experience of Switzerland with the essence of Peru, 'Hotels Peruano Suiza ' was born in Machu Picchu, allowing the guest to experience the warmest welcome and an exceptional experience during their stay
aboutus.mision_desc: We are a family business that blends the Swiss lifestyle and Peruvian warmth to provide our visitors with an exceptional experience.
aboutus.vision_desc: Being in Machu Picchu the best place to work, where our visitors can rest, relax and remain with a smile throughout their stay.
galeria.subtitle: DISCOVER CUSCO AND ITS MYSTERIES
galeria.text1: Then come back and rest with us...
galeria.title2: CUSCO, MAGIC AND MYSTERY AWAITS YOU...
galeria.card_title_1: Te damos la bienvenida a Cusco, dejanos cuidarte...
galeria.card_title_2: Queremos que te sientas como en casa, eres importante para nosotros.
